definitions.definition: The migration of electrically charged molecules through a medium under the influence of an electric field .
The separation and analysis of large molecules (such as proteins ) by migrating a colloidal solution of them through a gel ; gel electrophoresis .

main_definition: ( electricity ) The migration of electrically charged molecules through a medium under the influence of an electric field .
secondary_definitions: ( analytical chemistry , biochemistry ) The separation and analysis of large molecules (such as proteins ) by migrating a colloidal solution of them through a gel ; gel electrophoresis .
